INVALID_CODE: {{author}} That card code is either invalid or not in your collection
NO_GIF: {{author}} You cannot remove cosmetics from a `GIF` card
NOT_MORPHED: {{author}} That card has no `Morph` applied to it
UM_CONFIRMATION:
Are you sure you want to remove this card's `Morph`?
This process will cost **100** `Silver`
NO_OWNER: {{author}} This card is no longer in your collection
NOT_ENOUGH_SILVERS: {{author}} You don't have enough `Silver` for this process
